name: OB_CSECT_IND_LG
description: This table contains the indications for a C-Section.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OB_CSECT_IND_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the c-section indication, as recorded in the surgical log.
